content: i m so excited to share this month s chubby bunnies they re a mix of all the things that remind me of this time of year with school starting back for many kiddos and those days where fall is trying to make an appearance this collection has it all we have a pencil glue stick and apple ready for the first day plus we can t say goodbye to summer without one last s more by the campfire pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet back loops only front loops only slip_stitch finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
